DOC.brief_summary: To Determine whether an eight-week posterior shoulder stretch was effective in increasing dominant arm internal rotation(IR) and horizontal adduction (HAd) range of motion (ROM) in a group of overhead athletes identified as having tightness of their posterior shoulder structures.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of an 8-week Posterior Shoulder Stretching Program on Varsity-level Overhead Athletes
DOC.criteria: varsity level athletes involved in volleyball, tennis and swimming with internal rotation deficit of greater than or equal to 15 degrees previous surgical procedure or fracture of either shoulder or presently receiving treatment for condition affecting either shoulder
